mixinXml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<mixin>
  <name>input_text1</name>
  <module>mymodule</module>
  <display-name />
  <items>
    <input type="TextLine" name="input_text1">
      <label>Line Text 1</label>
      <immutable>false</immutable>
      <indexed>false</indexed>
      <custom-text />
      <help-text>Help text line 1</help-text>
      <occurrences minimum="1" maximum="1" />
    </input>
  </items>
</mixin>
